movies.title: Scandaleuse Gilda
movies.plot: A woman catches her husband in bed with a much younger lady. Shocked and distraught, the woman leaves her husband. She decides to embark on a road trip of erotic self discovery. The woman meets a cartoonist during her sensual pilgrimage and gets involved in a torrid sexual affair with him.
movies.simplePlot: A woman catches her husband in bed with a much younger lady. Shocked and distraught, the woman leaves her husband. She decides to embark on a road trip of erotic self discovery. The woman ...

biography.bio: Monica Guerritore was born on January 5, 1958 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. She is an actress, known for La lupa (1996), Tell No One (2012) and The Worst Week of My Life (2011). She has been married to Roberto Zaccaria since August 17, 2010. She was previously married to Gabriele Lavia.
biography.name: Monica Guerritore

biography.bio: Gabriele Lavia is one of the most important figures on the Italian stage scene. He devoted his work also to cinema, creating characters for some famous Italian horror movies like David Hemmings friend in "Profondo Rosso", the journalist of "Zeder". He also directed some movies like "Scandalosa Gilda" and "La Lupa" with longtime companion Monica Guerritore. He portrayed the gay stage director in "Ricordati Di Me" by Gabriele Muccino. But his work is mainly on stage. As actor and director, he put on stage the works of Shakespeare, Strindberg and Pirandello. He started in 1975 with William Shakespeare's "Othello". His last work was "Who's afraid of Virginia Woolf?" by Edward Albee in 2005.
biography.name: Gabriele Lavia

biography.bio: Pina Cei was born on June 13, 1904 in San Juan, Puerto Rico as Giuseppina Casini. She was an actress, known for Les yeux noirs (1987), Film d'amour et d'anarchie (1973) and La Traviata (1982). She died on February 1, 2000 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Pina Cei

biography.bio: Jasmine Maimone is an actress, known for Demons (1985), Paganini Horror (1989) and Scandaleuse Gilda (1985).
biography.name: Jasmine Maimone

biography.bio: Dario Mazzoli is an actor, known for Evil Senses (1986), Scandaleuse Gilda (1985) and Puro cashmere (1986).
biography.name: Dario Mazzoli

biography.bio: Sacha Darwin was born in 1947 in Salzburg, Austria as Sascha Maria Albach-Retty. She is an actress, known for Touch of Death (1988), Bactron 317 ou L'espionne qui venait du show (1979) and Voices from Beyond (1991).
biography.name: Sacha Darwin

biography.bio: Italo Gasperini is an actor and writer, known for Don't Shoot on Children (1978), L'albero dei destini sospesi (1997) and Scandaleuse Gilda (1985).
biography.name: Italo Gasperini
